products.name: Garam Masala
products.description: A blend of ground spices used in Indian cuisine. The mix typically includes cumin, coriander, cardamom, pepper, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg.

products.name: Sabji Masala
products.description: A perfect blend for enhancing the flavor of any vegetable dish. Contains a balance of spices like coriander, cumin, turmeric, and red chili.

products.name: Meat Masala
products.description: Specially crafted to complement and enhance the flavor of meat dishes. Contains black pepper, cloves, cinnamon, and other aromatic spices.

products.name: Chicken Masala
products.description: A perfectly balanced blend designed specifically for chicken dishes, containing coriander, cumin, red chili, and other essential spices.

products.name: Chhole Masala
products.description: A special blend for the popular chickpea curry. Contains cinnamon, cloves, black cardamom and other spices that give the dish its distinct flavor.

products.name: Paneer Masala
products.description: A flavorful blend specifically designed for cottage cheese dishes. Contains a perfect balance of aromatic spices to complement the mild flavor of paneer.

products.name: Masala Tea
products.description: Our signature tea blend with a perfect balance of cardamom, cinnamon, ginger, and cloves. Perfect for a refreshing cup of chai.

products.name: Dal Tadka Mix
products.description: Instant mix for preparing the classic Dal Tadka. Just add to boiled lentils for a quick and delicious meal.

products.name: Masala Papad
products.description: Crunchy papadums seasoned with our special masala blend. Perfect as an appetizer or a side dish.

products.name: Biryani Masala
products.description: A royal blend of spices essential for the perfect biryani. Contains bay leaves, star anise, cardamom, and other aromatic spices.
